metaDescription: Artist portfolio in sci‑fi/cyberpunk style with retro monitor effects, TextScramble, pixel glitch logo, artist photo and portfolio cards.

about.bioText: Mark Bogdanov is an artist working at the intersection of art, technology and engineering aesthetics. His works explore the influence of scientific progress on visual forms, combining modern production methods with traditional materials. Born in 1998, his creativity was shaped amid the digital revolution and rich cultural traditions.
about.statementText: I create sculptures where modern production techniques meet the legacy of past engineering thought. My art is a search for form, structure and material that reflect the logic of scientific progress. In my works, I combine 3D printing, laser cutting, and digital processing to illustrate the dialogue between the past and the future.
